page.title: 15BARNS GREEN CLUBS
page.content: THE YEAR WHEN{BARNS GREEN}CRICKET CLUB WAS FORMED IS NOT KNOWN BUT IT IS THOUGHT IT WAS FOUNDED IN THE 19TH CENTURY. NOWADAYS BARNS GREEN IS A SMALL CLUB WITH 3 TEAMS,BARNS GREEN {TENNIS CLUB}HAS ABOUT 30 MEMBERS.IT WAS STARTED IN 1982. THE BARNS GREEN {HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY}HAS ABOUT 60 MEMBERS AND HAS BEEN GOING FOR ABOUT 12 YEARS. MRS.D. BOYD IS THE SECRETARY. EVERY YEAR THE SOCIETY HOLDS A SPRING SHOW AND A SUMMER SHOW. THE {W.I.}HAS 46 MEMBERS WHO ATTEND REGULAR MONTHLY MEETINGS ON A THURSDAY AFTERNOON.THE{MONDAY CLUB}HAS ABOUT 60 MEMBERS MOST OF WHOM JOINED IN 1973. THE CLUB WHICH IS FOR THE OVER SIXTIES, MEETS EVERY TWO WEEKS ON A MONDAY. IN ADDITION THERE IS{BELL {RINGING}EACH FRIDAY EVENING.
